name: Praharsh Kumar Agrawal
position: Designing Shopping Experience for 150M users @Meesho | IIT Roorkee | Prev Design@ Hevo, Goodworker, Fleek, Clinikk & Zyephr

current_company.name: Meesho
current_company.title: Designing Shopping Experience for 150M users @Meesho | IIT Roorkee | Prev Design@ Hevo, Goodworker, Fleek, Clinikk & Zyephr

experience.title: Product Designer
experience.description: Designing Meesho's Core Shopping Experience charter which is used by 150 Million users monthlyI worked on all critical charters of shopping experience: Search, Browsing Experience, UGC, Transact, Recommendations & Gold Program which brings $5B GMV.Focusing on delivering intuitive experiences to our target users, those from villages and tier-3 —the next billion internet users which also involves conducting in-person user interviews, calls, and usability tests to gain valuable insights while managing a lot of stakeholders.Key Projects:Expectation Reality Mismatch(ERM)/User Generated Content (UGC): (0.51pp NQD drop, 0.3 NMV Retention uptick)Solved ERM by showing Product Attribute Specific Ratings (ASR) on Product Details Page UGC section which helped users to build better understanding of the product and reduce NQD and increase NMV retention. Redesigned the input flow of UGC collection to collect these ASR and revamped L1 & L2 reasons design while increasing Media & Text review fill rate.ASR fill rate: 50%, inc in L1& L2 reason fill rate: 5pp & 10pp, inc in Media & Text review fill rate: 0.6pp & 4.3ppRecommendations: Retargeting (0.9% NMV/Vi uptick) and Cross-Sell (0.3NMV/Vi uptick) Designing experiences in Recommendation team aimed at retargeting and cross-selling products, contributing directly to the strategic goal of boosting NMV.Search:0.3% NMV/Vi uptick, 1pp dropoff reducedRevamped Search Landing Page to reduce bounce off rate by introducing right channels.Transact:0.5% NMV/Vi uptickRevamped order review and payment page to increase the sense of FOMO on discounts and ease information scanning to increase transactions.Meesho Gold: Addressed challenges related to Visibility & Awareness and comprehension of Gold Program to inc Gold's contribution to NMV by redesigning Gold Landing Page(Gold GMV/Vi up by 4%,), introducing Gold widget on PDP(Gold GMV/Vi up by 22%) and horizontal feed of Gold products in vertical feed (Gold GMV/Vi up by 6.3%)
experience.description_html: Designing Meesho's Core Shopping Experience charter which is used by 150 Million users monthlyI worked on all critical charters of shopping experience: Search, Browsing Experience, UGC, Transact, Recommendations & Gold Program which brings $5B GMV.Focusing on delivering intuitive experiences to our target users, those from villages and tier-3 —the next billion internet users which also involves conducting in-person user interviews, calls, and usability tests to gain valuable insights while managing a lot of stakeholders.Key Projects:Expectation Reality Mismatch(ERM)/User Generated Content (UGC): (0.51pp NQD drop, 0.3 NMV Retention uptick)Solved ERM by showing Product Attribute Specific Ratings (ASR) on Product Details Page UGC section which helped users to build better understanding of the product and reduce NQD and increase NMV retention. Redesigned the input flow of UGC collection to collect these ASR and revamped L1 & L2 reasons design while increasing Media & Text review fill rate.ASR fill rate: 50%, inc in L1& L2 reason fill rate: 5pp & 10pp, inc in Media & Text review fill rate: 0.6pp & 4.3ppRecommendations: Retargeting (0.9% NMV/Vi uptick) and Cross-Sell (0.3NMV/Vi uptick) Designing experiences in Recommendation team aimed at retargeting and cross-selling products, contributing directly to the strategic goal of boosting NMV.Search:0.3% NMV/Vi uptick, 1pp dropoff reducedRevamped Search Landing Page to reduce bounce off rate by introducing right channels.Transact:0.5% NMV/Vi uptickRevamped order review and payment page to increase the sense of FOMO on discounts and ease information scanning to increase transactions.Meesho Gold: Addressed challenges related to Visibility & Awareness and comprehension of Gold Program to inc Gold's contribution to NMV by redesigning Gold Landing Page(Gold GMV/Vi up by 4%,), introducing Gold widget on PDP(Gold GMV/Vi up by 22%) and horizontal feed of Gold products in vertical feed (Gold GMV/Vi up by 6.3%)
